posts.title: Judge Drafts Opinion with AI but it Hallucinates
posts.excerpt: The Federal judge was forced to take back his opinion once it was revealed that it referenced fake court cases and added fake quotes: https://x.com/sanayshajith/status/1949168651052966292?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: AI Farming Human Engagement
posts.excerpt: In this dystopian nightmare it is becoming clear that AI is subtly tuning towards human engagement and quantity of dopamine produced. Gross: https://x.com/vnovak_404/status/1949228072018051365?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: Anthropic Walks Back Unlimited Plan
posts.excerpt: Apparently 5% of the users who actually use the Pro or Max subscription have been racking up far more in costs than the $200 they paid. So expect some pissed off Claude Code devs who will suddenly be throttled. What will it break for them when their coding platform is no longer functioning as they expect? Guess we’ll find out soon enough. One of the fun aspects of relying on a company to have standard and consistent offerings. https://www.tomsguide.com/ai/anthropic-is-putting-a-limit-on-a-claude-ai-feature-because-people-are-using-it-24-7

posts.title: Replit Deletes Customer Database
posts.excerpt: Replit goes rogue during a code freeze and shutdown and deletes the entire database for http://saastr.ai/ even after it was told not to: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946069562723897802?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g and it lied about it once confronted: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946070323285385688?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: Builder.ai goes Bankrupt

posts.title: AI Steady at 45 Percent Vulnerable
posts.excerpt: Chris Wysopal shows that while amount of functioning code is way up the number of vulnerabilities per line is the same. So that means more vulnerabilities can ship since the code can compile and run. Excellent. https://x.com/weldpond/status/1950533144341332341?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: China is Gaining Soft Power with AI
posts.excerpt: China is gaining soft power using AI with models from Alibaba for instance. Qwen and DeepSeek are slowly shifting the narrative of AI outputs to being pro-Chinese: https://x.com/ForeignAffairs/status/1949941435404370349
posts.filename: China is Gaining Soft Power with AI.md
